page.title: 16RECREATION IN 1985.
page.content: Recreation is an interesting subject for the eighties because more people have time to enjoy it.We found out pupils hobbies in Berry Hill Middle . The most popular in the First Year and Second Year was swimming. The Third Years like bike riding as their most popular hobby.The Fourth Year's most popular hobby was sport. The Coxmoor Golf Club is for all ages to play golf.It has eighteen holes and there is a shop next to it which sells golf equipment.We found out about Berry Hill Squash Club,it has eight courts and it costs 30p per game.
